product_name: Patagonia Capilene 3 Midweight Zip-Neck Top - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Maintain your internal thermostat with the Patagonia Capilene(R) 3 Zip-Neck Top, a highly breathable and quick-drying long underwear layer for aerobic activities in a wide range of temperatures. Patagonia Capilene3 is made from partially recycled fabric, improving durability, stretch and dry time. The smooth exterior of Polartec(R) Power Dry(R) polyester slides easily under layers, and its brushed interior feels soft against skin. Natural odor control employs benign amino acids to help keep funky scents at bay. Zipper allows quick ventilation and is backed by a draft flap; tucks neatly into zipper garage. Raglan sleeves and single-piece shoulder panel merge out of the way for increased comfort under a backpack, ski bibs or wader straps. Side seams are positioned a bit forward to prevent chafing under a hipbelt. Contoured, slim fit minimizes bulk to create an easy-layering garment that won't restrict your movement. Hem is long enough in back to stay tucked in. Flatlock seams reduce chafing and increase durability. 100% recyclable through Patagonia's Common Threads Recycling Program-simply return your worn out item to Patagonia. Closeout.
